snippet.title: Altidore's playing time a concern for Klinsmann
snippet.description: Jozy Altidore's disappointing first season with England's Sunderland has less than a month remaining, and it appears as though the American's struggles for playing time aren't finished.

snippet.title: Transcript: Vladi-mir Putin's April 17 Q&A
snippet.description: The Russian president Vlaidmir Putin held a question-and-answer session with Russians in a studio audience, from those calling in or texting, and from a video link in the Crimean city of Sevasotpol.

snippet.title: Hot hoods: Logan Circle/Shaw
snippet.description: Once riddled with strip clubs, massage parlors and auto malls, Logan Circle (and neighboring Shaw) have undergone quite a revival to become two of the trendiest hoods in town.

snippet.title: 'Mad Men' recap: A tale of two cities
snippet.description: As the final season begins, a look at life in both New York and Los Angeles

snippet.title: For Europe, balancing act on new Russian penalties
snippet.description: The United States is working to convince a reluctant Europe of the need to punish Russia more severely for its meddling in Ukraine while at the same time warning Moscow to step back or take more financial hits.

snippet.title: In Old Town Alexandria, a chance to buy new and skip the headache of owning old property
snippet.description: Old Town Commons is sought-after because most property in the historic town is, well, old even if well-kept.

snippet.title: Notable deaths in the Washington area
snippet.description: Obituaries of residents from the District, Maryland and Northern Virginia.coding for web is cq on display hed, blurb and seo hed. don't hightlight one person. don't say 'Local obituaries: Notable deaths .... ' because its under Local obituaries hedder already. /// should add each person's name to quick metadata

snippet.title: Enjoying coffee and community in downtown L.A.'s hip new Arts District
snippet.description: A reviving neighborhood in downton Los Angeles offers coffee, community, street art and more.

snippet.title: Meet the new group of twentysomethings trying to elect young people in 2014
snippet.description: LaunchProgress hopes to help young state legislature candidates in Michigan, Ohio and North Carolina wage better campaigns.

snippet.title: Old and new mix on a Bethesda bar crawl
snippet.description: Testing new cocktails at Roof becomes and excuse for a four-stop Bethesda bar crawl.
